common_2080_rival_02:
You’ve gotta go through the application process
with a staffer before you can actually participate\r
in the tournament![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_2080_rival_03: Ready for that explanation now, mister![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_2080_staff_01:
All right. The rules of the Academy Ace
Tournament are as follows:\c
Any student or faculty member of the academy
may enter. Your opponents will be random, and\r
only winners will advance to the next round!
common_2080_staff_02:
Opponents will be matched by lottery, and the
lottery is run by the people in charge.
common_2080_staff_03:
That means you’ll have no idea who you’ll be
facing until you meet them on the battle court!
common_2080_staff_04:
Winners, as I said, will get to advance to the
next round.
common_2080_staff_05:
But lose once, and you’re knocked out—no more
battles for you after that.
common_2080_staff_06:
The last Trainer standing—the only person to win
all their matches—will be deemed the best of all,\r
the academy’s ace!
common_2080_rival_05:
We hashed out the tournament rules with help
from Director Clavell.[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_2080_rival_06:
Based on the number of entrants so far, you’d
probably have to win four times to take it all![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_2080_rival_07:
Don’t forget you might go up against the faculty,
too. They’re tough stuff...so good luck and go be\r
even tougher![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_2080_rival_08: The only person allowed to beat you is me![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_2080_staff_07: Please talk to me when you’re ready to take part.
